meanings.sent1: Don't be a dumbo and listen to your teacher.
meanings.sent2: The dumbo in the class always makes silly mistakes.
meanings.sent3: The dumbo thought the sun was made of cheese!
meanings.sent4: She felt like a dumbo when she realized she forgot her keys at home.
meanings.sent5: Being a dumbo can sometimes lead to funny situations.

meanings.sent1: Tripping over your own feet is such a dumbo move.
meanings.sent2: His decision to quit his job without a plan was a real dumbo move.
meanings.sent3: She made a dumbo move by wearing mismatched shoes to the party.
meanings.sent4: Skipping breakfast was a dumbo move before running a marathon.
meanings.sent5: The dumbo move of forgetting his umbrella left him soaked in the rain.

meanings.sent1: That was a dumbo thing to say in front of everyone.
meanings.sent2: Her dumbo remark about the moon being made of cheese made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent3: He couldn't help but make a dumbo remark about the cat wearing sunglasses.
meanings.sent4: The dumbo remark about the weather being controlled by birds puzzled everyone.
meanings.sent5: Making a dumbo remark about the president's pet parrot was not the best idea.
